item.title: Script to simplify Netflix activity pages (in progress)
item.description: I love Netflix, but there's no easy way to get a listing of the movies I've rated through the service. To ease with that, I've finally started on a script that will clean the Netflix output, so it's a bit easier to parse.

item.title: How to easily clear the window.applicationCache on select browsers
item.description: How to 'easily' clear application cache (cache manifest) data for Chrome, and Safari on i-devices.

item.title: If Firefox recommends ad blocking software ...
item.description: Are Firefox add-ons more of a strain than Chrome?

item.title: Current, major, browsers
item.description: Listing of the current (major) browsers, with basic versioning information.

item.title: Browser environments for testing
item.description: The three virtual environments I'd recommend for in-depth browser testing, for Web applications.
